Tweet: The midfield trio of Sergio Busquets, Gavi and Pedri created a combined 9 chances in #Qatar2022, despite playing in all of @SEFutbol's 4 games.  FIVE of those chances also came in the 7-0 win over @fedefutbolcrc, meaning they all totaled four key passes in the final three games.  https://t.co/g0SsixQocX
